title: An Act relative to the integrity of state data systems

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Crighton, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 1059) of Brendan P. Crighton and Lindsay N. Sabadosa for legislation relative to access to justice.  The Judiciary.
